text:
@realDonaldTrump 120K+ #Americans dead from #COVID19. 1 in 4 out of work. Rich getting richer because the @GOP is working to make the poor even more poor. @ICEgov putting kids in cages. Racists in the @WhiteHouse. Monsters behind badges.

That's the scandal of our times, @POTUS. STFU & GBTW.
